summary: A comprehensive test suite that validates the Qwen2 model's functionality, including sequence classification (both single and multi-label), configuration handling, flash attention behavior during generation and inference, embedding variations, past key-value formatting, and efficient save/load mechanisms.
business_intent: Guarantee the reliability and performance of the Qwen2 model for production use by confirming correct behavior across classification tasks, attention optimizations, and model serialization, thereby supporting downstream AI applications.
